name: CL_PAT_EDU_NM
description: This table contains information about patient education records, including the education key.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The Line Count for the items that have multiple responses but do not change over time.

columns.name: EDU_CSN_KEY
columns.description: The education key with contact serial number (CSN). The education is a string of Title^Topic^Point-Patient CSN
